title: Ticket #5495: test needed for condor_submit -batch-name
description:
A test is needed for the new -batch-name command line argument for both condor_submit and condor_submit_dag.

The test should

  • call condor_submit -batch-name -dry and verify the the JobBatchName attribute is set.
  • repeat the above with the argument to -batch-name in double quotes and containing at least 1 space.
  • call condor_submit -batch-name to submit a job on hold and then run condor_q -progress and verify that the given name occurs under the BATCH_NAME column.
  • call condor_submit -batch-name again with the same batch name then run condor_q -progress and verify that the given batch name occurrs only once and that the hold column contains the correct number of jobs.
